ARTICLE.TITLE: 15 years after disengagement from Gaza, area still mired by violence
ARTICLE.TEXT: The Herps Alive Foundation Reptile Rescue and the South Euclid Humane Society will hold a pet food drive and distribution from 12 p.m. to 3 p.m. Aug. 22. The South Euclid Humane Society will have adoptable cats at the event and the Herps Alive Foundation will be open from 10 a.m. to 6 p.m.

METADATA.description: Three Israelis with direct ties to the move deconstruct lessons learned from the 2005 pullout when it comes to possible “land for peace” deals in Judea and Samaria.The post 15
METADATA.author: Josh Hasten
